Name: SQUIB & ABORT CHECK (T-40)
checklistText:
SQUIB BATTERY & ABORT CAPABILITY CHECK (T-40)
(Approx. T-40)

1. Squib Battery (3) - OFF
2. Voltmeter selector to S1
3. Squib Battery 1 - UMB
4. Verify volts > 24v.
5. Squib Battery 2 - UMB
6. Verify volts > 24v.
7. Squib Battery 3 - UMB
8. Verify volts > 24v.
9. Squib Battery 1 - OFF
10. Squib Battery 2 - OFF
11. Verify volts is 0v.
12. Voltmeter selector to S1
13. Squib Battery 1 - UMB
14. Verify volts > 24v.
15. Squib Battery 2 - UMB
16. Verify volts > 24v.
17. Squib Battery 3 - UMB
18. Verify volts > 24v.
19. Squib Battery 1 - OFF
20. Squib Battery 2 - OFF
21. Verify volts is 0v.
22. All squib batteries to UMB
23. Voltmeter selector to C
24. Verify volts > 24v.
25. Verify Abort Lights (2) - Extinguished
26. Request Abort & Squib Check from Blockhouse
27. After 5 seconds: Squibs are checked
28. If squibs OK: Verify Abort lights Illuminated
29. After 15 seconds: Test results are returned
30. If success: Proceed
31. If failed: Repeat
